name: Snecca
description:
An improved version of a neat jam game where you break the most basic rules of the classic game "Snake" for some neat interactions.

For those who have never played the original arcade game "Snake", you can only lose in that game by touching a wall or yourself. :) 

There are still SO many things I can think of to do with this, but I want to get moving onto more projects for the time being, so polished this one up a bit further and called it once again.
